001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.shapes.Shape2D;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.TrainableScalarFunction;
007
008public class ConvolutionalFilter implements TrainableScalarFunction<Float> {
009
010    private final ConvolutionalKernel kernel;
011    private Array<Float> parameters;
012
013    public static ConvolutionalFilter create(int size, int channels) {
014        Array<Float> parameters = JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT.createArray(size * size * channels + 1);
015        return new ConvolutionalFilter(new ConvolutionalKernel(Shape2D.of(size, size), channels, 1, parameters.slice(1)), parameters);
016    }
017
018    public ConvolutionalFilter(ConvolutionalKernel kernel, Array<Float> parameters) {
019        this.kernel = kernel;
020        this.parameters = parameters;
021    }
022
023    public ConvolutionalShape getShape() {
024        return kernel;
025    }
026
027    public Float applyToWindow(ConvolutionalShape window) {
028        return estimateScalar(window.getElements());
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public Array<Float> calculateParameterGradients(Array<Float> inputs) {
033        return inputs;
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public Float estimateScalar(Array<Float> inputs) {
038        Array<Float> weights = kernel.getWeights();
039        float result = parameters.get(0);
040        for (int i = 0; i < weights.length(); i++) {
041            result += weights.get(i) * inputs.get(i);
042        }
043        return result;
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public int getParameterCount() {
048        return parameters.length();
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public Array<Float> getParameters() {
053        return parameters;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public Float getParameter(int p) {
058        return parameters.get(p);
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public void setParameters(Array<Float> values) {
063        this.parameters = values;
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void setParameter(int p, Float value) {
068        parameters.set(p, value);
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public int arity() {
073        return kernel.getElements().length();
074    }
075
076    @Override
077    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> getNumberTypeSupport() {
078        return JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT;
079    }
080}
